content.rendered:
Install Bibledit on Chrome OS

  1. Enable Android apps on Chrome OS.
  2. Install Bibledit from Google Play on Chrome OS.
  3. Start the Bibledit app.
  4. Leave it shortly to initialize.
  5. Connect to Bibledit Cloud via menu Settings / Cloud.

Home
Review
